import React from 'react' import { Typography , Button, Divider} from '@material-ui/core' import { Elements, CardElement, ElementsConsumer,CardElementContainer } from '@stripe/react-stripe-js'; import { loadStripe } from '@stripe/stripe-js'; import Review from './Review' const PaymentForm =(props)=> { const {cartItems,backStep} = props; const stripePromise= loadStripe(process.env.REACT_APP_STRIPE); console.log(stripePromise) return ( <> Payment method {({elements, stripe}) => (


)} ) } export default PaymentForm
